channel.title: Last day of the month
channel.description:
Hi, I need to get the **last day of the month** of a given date.
Normally in Pl/SQL I would use this function **LAST_DAY( sysdate)**
This is th result I need - Input: 07/08/2021 - Output: 31/08/2021
How could I get it in Redash?

item.title: Last day of the month
item.dc:creator: Celso
item.description:
Hi,
I need to get the last day of the month of a given date.

Normally in Pl/SQL I would use this function LAST_DAY( sysdate)

This is th result I need

  • Input: 07/08/2021
  • Output: 31/08/2021

How could I get it in Redash?

Read full topic
